data.name: MOVETYPE_COMMAND_EXAMPLE
data.value:
#To move a type to another container...
MoveType(0x170f, "backpack", "bank")
#Destination can be the ground by specifying destination container to -1 and specifying the coordinates...
MoveType(0x170f, "backpack", -1, 1928, 2526, 0)
#Optional parameters exist for Hue and Amount, to move 10 maximum with the a Hue of 50... MoveType(0x170f, "backpack", "bank", -1, -1, 0, 50, 10)

data.name: FLY_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: (Garoyle) Start flying if not already flying.

data.name: FLYING_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if mobile is currently flying.

data.name: ATTACK_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Attack mobile (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: BANDAGESELF_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Applies a bandage to the player.

data.name: CLICKOBJECT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Single click object (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: CONTENTS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the item count for given container.

data.name: EQUIPITEM_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Equip a specific item into a given layer. Use object inspector to determine layer value.

data.name: EQUIPLASTWEAPON_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Send quick switch weapon packet (probably not supported on pre-AoS servers.

data.name: EQUIPTYPE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Equip a specific type into a given layer. Use object inspector to determine layer value.

data.name: FEED_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Feed a given alias or serial with graphic.

data.name: FINDLAYER_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true and updates found alias if an item exists in the specified layer, option serial/alias for mobile to check.

data.name: INREGION_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the region of the target has the specified attribute.

data.name: PING_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Retrieve an approximated ping with server. -1 on failure.

data.name: SHOWNAMES_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Display corpses and/or mobiles names (parameter "mobiles" or "corpses".

data.name: TOGGLEMOUNTED_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Unmounts if mounted, or mounts if unmounted, will prompt for mount if no "mount" alias.

data.name: USEOBJECT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sends use (doubleclick) request for given object (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: USEONCE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Use a specific item type (graphic) from your backpack, only once

data.name: USETYPE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sends use (doubleclick) request for given type, optional parameters of hue and container object (defaults to player backpack) (parameters can be serial or alias).

data.name: WAITFORCONTENTS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Wait for container contents for given container.

data.name: WAITFORCONTEXT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Request or wait for a context menu option.

data.name: COUNTER_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the count of the given counter agent.

data.name: DRESS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Dress all items in the specified dress agent.

data.name: DRESSCONFIG_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Adds all equipped items to a temporary list that isn't persisted on client close.

data.name: DRESSING_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the Dress agent is currently dressing or undressing.

data.name: ORGANIZING_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if currently running an organizer agent, or false if not.

data.name: UNDRESS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Undress all items in the specified dress agent.

data.name: FINDALIAS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if alias serial can be found on screen, false if not.

data.name: GETALIAS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Gets the value of the given alias name.

data.name: PROMPTALIAS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Prompt with an in-game target cursor to supply value for given alias name.

data.name: SETALIAS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sets the value of the given alias name.

data.name: SETMACROALIAS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sets the value of the given alias name, alias is valid only in the current macro.

data.name: ADDFRIEND_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Adds a mobile to friends list, will display target cursor if no serial/alias supplied.

data.name: ALLY_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the mobile's notoriety is Ally

data.name: COUNTTYPE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Amount comparison of item type inside a container.

data.name: COUNTTYPEGROUND_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Amount comparison of item or mobile type on the ground.

data.name: CRIMINAL_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the mobile's notoriety is Criminal

data.name: DEAD_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if given mobile is dead, false if not, if parameter is null, then returns the value from the player (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: DEX_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the dexterity of the player

data.name: DIFFHITS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the given mobiles difference between max and current hits, if parameter is null, then returns the value from the player (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: DIFFWEIGHT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the difference between max weight and weight.

data.name: DIRECTIONTO_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the Direction the entity is in relative to the player.

data.name: DISTANCE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the distance to the given entity.

data.name: ENEMY_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the mobile's notoriety is Enemy

data.name: FINDOBJECT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Searches for entity by serial and sets found alias, defaults to ground if no source given.

data.name: FINDTYPE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Searches for entity by graphic ID and sets found alias, defaults to ground if no source given.

data.name: FOLLOWERS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the number of current followers as per status bar data.

data.name: GOLD_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the gold value as per status bar data.

data.name: GRAPHIC_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns Item ID of given object (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: GRAY_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the mobile's notoriety is Attackable

data.name: HIDDEN_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if given mobile is hidden, false if not, if parameter is null, then returns the value from the player (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: HITS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the given mobiles hitpoints, if parameter is null, then returns the value from the player (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: HUE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns Hue of given object (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: IGNOREOBJECT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Ignores the given object from find commands

data.name: INFRIENDLIST_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if supplied mobile exists in the friends list.

data.name: INNOCENT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the mobile's notoriety is Innocent

data.name: INPARTY_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Return the true if the given serial/alias is in party with you.

data.name: INRANGE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Check for range between your character and another mobile or an item

data.name: INT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the intelligence of the player

data.name: INVULNERABLE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the mobile's notoriety is Invulnerable

data.name: LUCK_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the luck value as per status bar data.

data.name: MANA_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the given mobiles mana, if parameter is null, then returns the value from the player (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: MAXFOLLOWERS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the number of max followers as per status bar data.

data.name: MAXHITS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the given mobiles max hitpoints, if parameter is null, then returns the value from the player (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: MAXMANA_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the given mobiles max mana, if parameter is null, then returns the value from the player (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: MAXSTAM_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the given mobiles max stamina, if parameter is null, then returns the value from the player (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: MAXWEIGHT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the max weight as per status bar data.

data.name: MOUNTED_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the specified mobile is mounted.

data.name: MOVEITEM_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Move item to container (parameters can be serials or aliases).

data.name: MOVEITEMOFFSET_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Move the given serial/alias to the specified x,y,z offset of the player, no amount specified or -1 will move the full stack.

data.name: MOVETYPE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Move a type from source to destintion.

data.name: MOVETYPEOFFSET_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Move the given type from the specified source container to the specified x,y,z offset of the player, no amount specified or -1 will move the full stack.

data.name: MURDERER_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the mobile's notoriety is Murderer

data.name: NAME_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Return the name of the given mobile.

data.name: PARALYZED_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the specified mobile is frozen.

data.name: POISONED_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the specified mobile is poisoned.

data.name: REMOVEFRIEND_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Removes a mobile from the friends list, will display target cursor if no serial/alias supplied.

data.name: SPECIALMOVEEXISTS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Check for a specific special move

data.name: STAM_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the given mobiles stamina, if parameter is null, then returns the value from the player (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: STR_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the strength of the player

data.name: TITHINGPOINTS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the current players' tithing points.

data.name: WAR_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Checks whether a mobile is in war mode.

data.name: WEIGHT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the current weight as as per status bar data.

data.name: X_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns X coordinate of given object (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: Y_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns Y coordinate of given object (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: YELLOWHITS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the specified mobile is yellowhits.

data.name: Z_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns Z coordinate of given object (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: GUMPEXISTS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Checks if a gump id exists or not.

data.name: INGUMP_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Check for a text in gump.

data.name: REPLYGUMP_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sends a button reply to server gump, parameters are gumpID and buttonID.

data.name: WAITFORGUMP_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Pauses until incoming gump packet is received, optional paramters of gump ID and timeout

data.name: INJOURNAL_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Check for a text in journal, optional source name.

data.name: WAITFORJOURNAL_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Wait the given timeout for the journal text to appear.

data.name: CREATELIST_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Create list with given name, if list already exists, it is overwritten.

data.name: GETLIST_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns array of all entries in the list, for use with for loop etc.

data.name: INLIST_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Checks whether a list contains a given element.

data.name: LIST_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the number of entries in the list.

data.name: LISTEXISTS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if list exist, or false if not.

data.name: PUSHLIST_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Pushes a value to the end of the list, will create list if it doesn't exist.

data.name: REMOVELIST_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Removes the list with the given name.

data.name: INFO_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Show object inspector for supplied serial / alias, will prompt for target if no parameter given.

data.name: MESSAGEBOX_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Show a simple message box with a custom title and body.

data.name: PAUSE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Pauses execution for the given amount in milliseconds.

data.name: PLAYING_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if there is a macro, use in background macros.

data.name: PLAYSOUND_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Play sound by id or system .wav file.

data.name: SETQUIETMODE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Set quiet mode True/False, True reduces the number of messages macro commands emit.

data.name: WARMODE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sets war mode status, parameter on, off, or toggle, defaults to toggle if no parameter given.

data.name: ALLYMSG_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sends given message to alliance chat.

data.name: GUILDMSG_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sends given message to guild chat.

data.name: HEADMSG_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Displays overhead message above given mobile / item.

data.name: MSG_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Speaks the given message, Optional hue

data.name: PARTYMSG_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sends given message to party chat.

data.name: PROMPTMSG_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sends the specified message as a prompt response

data.name: WAITFORPROMPT_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Wait the specified timeout for a prompt packet to be received

data.name: SETFORCEWALK_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Set force walk, True or False

data.name: PROPERTY_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the given text appears in the items item properties.

data.name: PROPERTYVALUE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the argument value of the given property name. Optional argument index.

data.name: WAITFORPROPERTIES_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Wait for item properties to be received for specified item.

data.name: SETSKILL_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sets the lock state of the given skill, up, down or locked.

data.name: SKILL_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the base value of the given skill name.

data.name: SKILLSTATE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns the lock status of the given skill, up, down, or locked.

data.name: CAST_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Cast the given named spell and automatically target given object.

data.name: CLEARTARGETQUEUE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Clears the target queue when queue last target/target self is enabled.

data.name: GETENEMY_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Get mobile and set enemy alias.

data.name: GETFRIEND_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Get mobile and set friend alias.

data.name: GETFRIENDLISTONLY_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Get friend that only exists in the friends list, parameter distance 'Closest'/'Nearest'/'Next'

data.name: TARGET_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Targets the given object (parameter can be serial or alias).

data.name: TARGETEXISTS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if a target cursor is displayed and the notoriety matches the supplied value, defaults to 'Any', options are 'Any', 'Beneficial', 'Harmful' or 'Neutral'

data.name: TARGETGROUND_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Target the specified type on the ground, optional parameters for hue and distance.

data.name: TARGETTILERELATIVE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Target tile the given distance relative to the specified alias/serial, optional boolean for reverse mode.

data.name: TARGETTYPE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Use specified type in player backpack, optional parameters for hue and search level.

data.name: WAITFORTARGET_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Wait for target packet from server, optional timeout parameter (default 5000 milliseconds).

data.name: WAITINGFORTARGET_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true whenever the core is internally waiting for a server target

data.name: SETTIMER_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Set a timer value and create in case it does not exist.

data.name: TIMER_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Check for a named timer value.

data.name: TIMEREXISTS_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Returns true if the timer exists.

data.name: TIMERMSG_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Outputs the elapsed timer value as a SystemMessage

data.name: FINDWAND_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Search for a wand and set alias "found".

data.name: EQUIPWAND_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Search for a wand inside your backpack and equip it

data.name: EQUIPWAND_COMMAND_EXAMPLE
data.value: #Equip a fireball wand if one can be found in our backpack.. if FindWand("fireball", "backpack", 5): #Remove current item in hand if FindLayer("OneHanded"): ClearHands("left") #Equip the wand EquipWand("fireball")

data.name: SETAUTOLOOTCONTAINER_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sets the container for the Autoloot agent to put items into...

data.name: FINDTYPE_COMMAND_EXAMPLE
data.value:
# Look for a food item from a list and eat 1 if found. if not ListExists("food"): CreateList("food") PushList("food", 0x9b7) #bird PushList("food", 0x9d3) #ham PushList("food", 0x97d) #cheese PushList("food", 0x9d0) #apple PushList("food", 0x9eb) #muffin PushList("food", 0x97b) #fishsteak PushList("food", 0x9c0) #sausage PushList("food", 0x9f2) #ribs PushList("food", 0x9d1) #grapes PushList("food", 0x9d2) #peach
for i in GetList("food"): if FindType(i, -1, "backpack"): UseObject("found") break

data.name: INIGNORELIST_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Check whether the given serial / alias exists in the ignore list.

data.name: SETFRIEND_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sets the friend to the given serial/alias.

data.name: SETENEMY_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sets the enemy to the given serial/alias.

data.name: SETLASTTARGET_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Sets the last target to the given serial/alias.

data.name: WAITFORTARGETORFIZZLE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Waits the specified timeout for target cursor whilst returning false if the spell is fizzled / uncastable beforehand.

data.name: SYSMESSAGE_COMMAND_EXAMPLE
data.value: # default hue SysMessage("Hello") # specifying hue SysMessage("Hello", 35)

data.name: FINDOBJECT_COMMAND_EXAMPLE
data.value:
# Find on ground FindObject("mount")
# Find on ground with range FindObject("mount", 10)
# Find in container, must specify search level or -1 FindObject("weapon", -1, "backpack")

data.name: OPENVIRTUEGUMP_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Opens the Virtue gump of the given serial/alias (defaults to current player)

data.name: GETENEMY_COMMAND_EXAMPLE
data.value: #get murderer GetEnemy(['Murderer']) #get closest murderer, any body type GetEnemy(['Murderer'], 'Any', 'Closest') #get next any notoriety, humanoid or transformation - unmounted GetEnemy(['Any'], 'Both', 'Next', 'Unmounted')

data.name: TARGETXYZ_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Targets the ground at the given coordinates.

data.name: REHUE_COMMAND_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Rehue an item/mobile the specified hue value, set to 0 to remove. (Experimental)
